nodes.bodyText:
Is there any existing style for buttons we could use here?
If so, please use it, else please add one.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<!--
+  ~ Catroid: An on-device visual programming system for Android devices

+  ~ along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
+  -->
+
+
+<!-- Overdraw lint warning is ignored - fragments need refactoring -->
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@color/app_background"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:ignore="Overdraw">
+
+    <org.catrobat.catroid.ui.BrickLayout
+        android:id="@+id/brick_user_brick"
+        style="@style/BrickContainer.Look.Medium"
+        android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/brick_darkblue_1h">
+        <include layout="@layout/icon_brick_category_look" />
+        <TextView
+            style="@style/BrickText.SingleLine"
+            android:labelFor="@+id/brick_user_brick_edit_text"
+            android:text="@string/brick_user_defined">
+        </TextView>
+        </org.catrobat.catroid.ui.BrickLayout>
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/add_label"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="60dp"

nodes.bodyText: Remove these new blank lines, please.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="brick_user_defined">Your brick</string>
          
      
    
    
  

The blue brick should initially be empty. No text shall be shown there.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        android:labelFor="@+id/brick_user_brick_edit_text"
          
          
            
                        android:text="@string/brick_user_defined">
          
          
            
                        android:labelFor="@+id/brick_user_brick_edit_text">
          
      
    
    
  

Or use android:text="", i.e., an empty string if necessary.
Reason: The blue brick should initially be empty. No text shall be shown there.

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="brick_add_new_user_brick">Add new User Brick</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="brick_add_new_user_brick">Add new brick</string>
          
      
    
    
  

Reason: The term "user brick" is only relevant for our developers, but shall not be visible for our users. Also, we try to use normal English capitalization rules.
